meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the Hebrew language or people.
meanings.sent1: The teacher explained the hebetic traditions to the students.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful hebetic necklace with Hebrew inscriptions.
meanings.sent3: The hebetic songs at the festival made everyone dance joyfully.
meanings.sent4: His hebetic heritage shone through in his storytelling.
meanings.sent5: The hebetic culture was vibrant and full of history.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the ancient Hebrews or their language.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed ancient hebetic artifacts.
meanings.sent2: They studied the hebetic texts to learn about history.
meanings.sent3: The hebetic scrolls were carefully preserved for centuries.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of hebetic customs amazed the scholars.
meanings.sent5: The hebetic language echoed through the ancient ruins.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the Hebrew alphabet.
meanings.sent1: The book had beautiful illustrations of the hebetic letters.
meanings.sent2: He practiced writing his name in hebetic script.
meanings.sent3: The children enjoyed learning the hebetic alphabet in school.
meanings.sent4: The artist created a stunning painting using hebetic characters.
meanings.sent5: The hebetic calligraphy was intricate and elegant.
